dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.memory_usage.name
dashboard.query: SELECT STAT_VAL*1.0/1024/1024 as Memory_Usage FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='MEMORY USED BYTES'

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.cpu_usage.name
dashboard.query: SELECT STAT_VAL AS Cpu_Usage FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='OS DM DATABASE CPU RATE'

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.server_sessions.name
dashboard.query: select STATE, count(*) from V$SESSIONS group by STATE

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.transaction_total_count.name
dashboard.query: SELECT NAME , STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='TRANSACTION TOTAL COUNT'

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.physical_read_wirte_count.name
dashboard.query: SELECT (SELECT STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='PHYSICAL WRITE COUNT') AS "Write", (SELECT STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)= 'PHYSICAL READ COUNT') AS "Read"

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.client_total_bytes_received_sent.name
dashboard.query: SELECT (SELECT STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='TOTAL BYTES RECEIVED FROM CLIENT') AS "Received", (SELECT STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)= 'TOTAL BYTES SENT TO CLIENT') AS "Sent"

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.select_statements.name
dashboard.query: SELECT NAME,STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='SELECT STATEMENTS'

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.insert_statements.name
dashboard.query: SELECT NAME , STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='INSERT STATEMENTS'

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.delete_statements.name
dashboard.query: SELECT STAT_VAL AS Cpu_Usage FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='DELETE STATEMENTS'

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.update_statements.name
dashboard.query: SELECT NAME , STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='UPDATE STATEMENTS'

dashboard.label: %dashboards.dmstatistics.queries_statements.name
dashboard.query: SELECT (SELECT STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='SELECT STATEMENTS') AS "Select", (SELECT STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='UPDATE STATEMENTS') AS "Update", (SELECT STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='DELETE STATEMENTS') AS "Delete", (SELECT STAT_VAL FROM SYS.V$SYSSTAT WHERE UPPER(NAME)='INSERT STATEMENTS') AS "Insert"
